STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_PRIMARY_TITLE: Unleash the Power of Fresh Fruits
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Discover Nature's Bounty with Our App
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: FruitApp is your one-stop destination for all things fruit-related.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: Find recipes, track nutrition, and connect with fellow fruit enthusiasts.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: Our app makes it easy to explore the world of fresh produce.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Join our community and embrace a healthy, fruity lifestyle!
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Discover a world of delicious and healthy fruits, handpicked and delivered straight to your doorstep.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Source the ripest and most flavorful fruits straight from local farms. Our app connects you directly with farmers for the freshest picks.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Enjoy nature's bounty with our rotating offerings of in-season fruits. From juicy berries to tropical delights, there's always something new to savor.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Never miss peak freshness again! Get notified when your favorite fruits are at their prime for harvesting and ordering.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Get to know the dedicated growers behind your fruits. Read their stories, learn about their techniques, and support sustainable farming practices.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Dive into the world of fruits with our comprehensive guides. Discover new varieties, nutritional benefits, and unique flavors to explore.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Share and discover delicious ways to enjoy your fresh fruits. Our community recipes provide endless inspiration for healthy and tasty creations.
HERO_TEXT_BEFORE_TITLE: Savor the Goodness of Nature's Bounty
HERO_TITLE: FreshFruitLicious: Your Gateway to Delectable Fruits
HERO_SUBTITLE: Discover a World of Juicy Flavors and Revitalizing Nutrition
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How Can We Help With Your Fresh Fruit Needs?
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How Did You Hear About Us?
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Fresh Fruit App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What types of fruits are available?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app offers a wide variety of fresh, seasonal fruits from local farms and orchards. This includes popular favorites like apples, oranges, bananas, and strawberries, as well as more unique options like starfruit, cherimoya, and dragonfruit.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How can I ensure I get the freshest fruits?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We source our fruits directly from growers and update our inventory daily to ensure maximum freshness. Check the app for the latest harvest dates and be sure to order fruits marked as 'just picked' for the most recently harvested options.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Do you offer any organic or pesticide-free options?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, we work closely with certified organic farms and clearly label any fruits grown without synthetic pesticides. Simply look for the 'organic' or 'pesticide-free' tags when browsing the app.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How do I care for my fresh fruit delivery?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Most fruits should be stored at room temperature away from direct sunlight until ripe. Check our storage tips in the app for specific guidance on getting the longest freshness from your favorite fruits.
CTA_TITLE: Juicy Fresh Fruits at Your Doorstep
CTA_BODY: Savor the taste of nature's bounty with our fresh fruit delivery service. We handpick the ripest, juiciest fruits and bring them straight to your doorstep.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our fruit app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What kinds of fruits are available?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app offers a wide variety of fresh fruits including apples, oranges, bananas, grapes, strawberries, and many more seasonal favorites.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How do I know the fruits are fresh?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We work directly with local farms and orchards to source our fruits at peak freshness. Each delivery is hand-inspected for quality.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, we offer a wide selection of organic fruits from certified organic growers. Just look for the 'Organic' label when placing your order.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We restock our fruit inventory daily to ensure maximum freshness. Popular items can sell out quickly, so order early for the best selection.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, we offer convenient delivery right to your doorstep. Delivery fees and areas vary, so check during checkout for your location.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Pick the ripest fruits straight from local farms and orchards right to your doorstep.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Enjoy a rotating variety of fresh produce, harvested at peak flavor with each changing season.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Support local agriculture and bring the taste of the countryside into your home with every delivery.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Bringing the finest farm-fresh fruits directly to your doorstep. Enjoy nature's bounty with FruitFresh.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Fresh with Our Fruit Updates
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it - hear from satisfied fruit lovers.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: FruitApp has been a game-changer for me! The fresh produce is always top-notch, and the convenience can't be beaten.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a health-conscious eater, I love how FruitApp makes it easy to get my hands on the freshest, most nutritious fruits around.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The quality of the fruit I receive from FruitApp is unmatched. It's like having a farmer's market delivered right to my door!
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Crisp and juicy apples, freshly picked
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Sweet and tangy oranges, bursting with flavor
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Ripe and creamy bananas, perfect for snacking
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Plump and delicious strawberries, straight from the farm
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Tangy and refreshing pineapples, a taste of the tropics
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Unlock the freshest fruits with our innovative app
